chinese: 瞧,Gary!
english: Look, Gary!

chinese: 那个警察正朝你挥手呢.
english: That policeman's waving to you.

chinese: 他想要你停下来.
english: He wants you to stop.

chinese: 你认为你现在是在哪儿?
english: Where do you think you are?

chinese: 在赛车道上吗?
english: On a race track?

chinese: 你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车.
english: You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.

chinese: 我不可能开得那么快的.
english: I can't have been.

chinese: 我是以每小时80英里的速度超过你的.
english: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.

chinese: 难道你没看见限速牌吗?
english: Didn't you see the speed limit?

chinese: 我恐怕我没有看见,警官.
english: I'm afraid I didn't, officer.

chinese: 我一定思想开小差了.
english: I must have been dreaming.

chinese: 警官,他思想没有开小差.
english: He wasn't dreaming, officer.

chinese: 我刚才正告诉他开慢点.
english: I was telling him to drive slowly.

chinese: 所以我才没看见那牌子.
english: That's why I didn't see the sign.

chinese: 让我看一看你的驾驶执照.
english: Let me see your driving licence.

chinese: 这次我就不罚你款了.
english: I won't charge you this time.

chinese: 但你最好不要再犯.
english: But you'd better not do it again!

chinese: 谢谢您.我以后一定会多加注意.
english: Thank you. I'll certainly be more careful.

chinese: Gary,我刚才叫你开慢点吧.
english: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.

chinese: 你总是叫我开慢点,亲爱的.
english: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.

chinese: Well,下次你最听从我的劝告!
english: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
